scripts.codegen: uv run manage.py export_openapi_schema --api app_chats.views.api | uv run python -m json.tool > openapi.json
scripts.build:frontend: mkdir -p chats/static/chats && rsync -a ../frontend/dist/ chats/static/chats && rsync -a ../frontend/dist/index.html chats/views/index.html
scripts.worker: uv run celery -A app_chats.jobs worker -l INFO
